title: Dark and Stormy Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Dark and Stormy Cocktail Recipe
Close

Prep
2 mins

2 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
ounce
fresh lime juice
, from
1 to 2
whole
limes
4
ounces
ginger beer
2
ounces
Gosling's Black Seal Rum
Directions
Fill a highball glass with ice. Add, in layers, the lime juice, then the ginger beer, then the Goslings. Serve with a straw.
Rum
Summer Drinks
